title: A Box Worth of Treasure
detail_text: <:th_ch0003/>Ai-chan, Ai-chan! I brought the masking tape we were talking about the other day<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Waah! It’s super cute! Thank you, Kotori! Ai also brought this!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>This is….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Look, there was a masking tape that you said was cute, right? So I modified a box for that. If you put masking tapes into this box it’ll fit just right, it’s something Ai use a lot♪ Since you said that you wanted to collect masking tapes too, I thought I’ll give it to you, Kotori<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Eeh!? You made this for me?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Now you match with me~♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>I’m so happy! Thank you, Ai-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Ehehe, I’d love it if you quickly fill it~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Then, though it might be sudden, won’t you go see some masking tapes with me? Actually, there’s a store that sells a limited edition masking tape right now….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Ah! I saw an article about that on the internet! Let’s go, let’s go~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
